alert.note: Alert for Central La Paz (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 1:24PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern La Paz County through 215 PM MST... At 123 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles north of Wenden, or 17 miles south of Alamo Lake, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern La Paz County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
